name: Export with Device - Automator (Community)
description:
This demo file showcases an automation made with Diagram's Automator plugin.


The automation adds an iPhone 13 Pro device to your design with export settings for presentation needs.


iPhone 13 Pro device variants include Sierra Blue, Graphite, Silver and Gold finishes.


NOTE

  • This automation is custom for a 390 x 844 screen.
  • You will need the Automator plugin to use the automation.
  • To use this automation for your own designs, you will need to copy the device component into your file.


You can see a preview here.
